paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Positive for technetium pyrophosphate (99 mTc-PYP) amyloid deposition in the heart (99 mTc-PYP visual grade 2) and died from a cardiovascular event 17 years after DLT.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: One patient who received the graft with the Ser50Ile TTR mutation was positive for technetium pyrophosphate (99 mTc-PYP) amyloid deposition in the heart (99 mTc-PYP visual grade 2) and died from a cardiovascular event 17 years after DLT.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation is the most common type of TTR mutation worldwide.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in families, as indicated by the presence of the mutation in affected individuals.
variants.additional_notes: The study included a total of 14 DLT recipients, with 13 carrying the Val30Met mutation.
key_quotes: Thirteen patients received domino liver grafts with the Val30Met mutation in the TTR gene, the most common type of TTR mutation worldwide.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Positive for technetium pyrophosphate (99 mTc-PYP) amyloid deposition in the heart and died from a cardiovascular event.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: One patient who received the graft with the Ser50Ile TTR mutation was positive for technetium pyrophosphate (99 mTc-PYP) amyloid deposition in the heart (99 mTc-PYP visual grade 2) and died from a cardiovascular event 17 years after DLT.

functional_data.summary: The Ser50Ile mutation is associated with amyloid deposition.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in the individual case.
variants.additional_notes: Only one patient was reported with this mutation.
key_quotes: Only 1 patient received a graft with the Ser50Ile TTR mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding TTR variants and penetrance were extracted.
